subject: Webmaster`s Profit Pak
body:

to sell others the

Over 10 brand new "must-have" software programs in one amazing
package!

You will "Absolutely Love" using these profitable, time-saving new
software tools!
Click here and visit my website
But we are also giving you the master
resale rights to them all...

So you can offer this huge, new software collection to others, using a copy of
this website... and YOU keep all the money!

And because all of your customers download the software themselves, your costs
per sale are zero!

YOU keep the full 100% of every sale!

And you won't find a better profit margin than that anywhere on the internet!
Click here and visit my website
You are getting a ready-made 100%
Profit 'Software Business'
which others would charge hundreds of dollars for...

...but at a fraction of the price!

Not $199, not $99, not even $79,
but for the ridiculously low price of only $29.95!

"This is an un-beatable offer!"

Look at all the sizzling-hot software programs included in this awesome new
collection...
Click here and visit my website
